introduction: SYNOPSISSong Dal-Ho was visited by Miss Mo, who slept with during business trip in Pusan, with an excuse of pregnancy. Song Dal-Ho, who became pressed, tried to negotiate but Miss Mo's mother demanded 5 million won. His wife Shin Tae-Ok suffered from this totally unexpected news but she decided to give that money to Miss Mo by selling her house which she purchased with much difficulties. However Miss Mo brought a lawsuit against him as well as threw an anonymous letter to the bank where he works to make him to be in trouble. After all Miss Mo accepted 5 million won from Tae-Ok and left Seoul after abortion of the baby.故事为借口错过父怀孕是釜山之旅谎言带来的宋Dalho。宋歌急于妥协，但母亲要求500万韩元。从蓝色sintaeok螺栓松Dalho妻子，而只担心即使处置房子的迎合了相同的事实，但它试图错过所有的tuseo投诉到法院而错过开车去银行事务的专业人士ppatteurinda麻烦的事情。最后，从太祖那里得到五百万韩元的小姐离开了汉城。
